description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Guingamp vs Laval in the Ligue 2
title: Guingamp vs Laval: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head

maintext:
Post
Attempt saved. Matthis Riou (Guingamp) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sabri Guendouz with a through ball.

Fourth official has announced 5 minutes of added time.
